techmeme.title: Sources: Meta is in talks to license its Horizon software to Jio, which would use it to power a VR device (The Information)
Sources: Humane's Ai Pin and accessories have brought in $9M+ in sales, and $1M+ worth of product has been returned; ~7,000 Ai Pins are still in customer hands (Kylie Robison/The Verge)
Instagram is making views the primary metric across all of its formats, letting creators track the same metric across Reels, Stories, photos, and more (Jay Peters/The Verge)
Roku plans to launch a free, ad-supported 24/7 sports channel on August 12, with live Sunday MLB games, Originals, and more on its devices, apps, and website (Etan Vlessing/The Hollywood Reporter)
Sources: Opal, previously Opal Camera, which makes $300 webcams, raised a $60M Series B led by OpenAI Startup Fund and plans to make new OpenAI-powered devices (The Information)
